title: Episode 124: Arguing Outcomes Instead of Principles Puts the Cart Before the Horse
itunes:title: Episode 124: Arguing Outcomes Instead of Principles Puts the Cart Before the Horse
description:
There appears to be a large problem in America with outcome-based thinking, particularly with regards to hot-button political issues. We skip straight to the ending we want and argue for it until we’re blue in the face, and everyone who doesn’t want the same must be evil, stupid, or both. But what if we started the conversation in a different place? What if we started it at the principles that lead to the desired outcome? Would the conversation change? James Harrigan and Antony Davies dig into the subject during their second live recording from FEEcon 2019 on this week’s episode of Words & Numbers.
